jobDescription: Data Scientist  San Jose, CA  Please email your resume to SONIA.DHAWAN@RHT.COM Responsibilities: ? Ability to develop models and algorithms to drive innovation for Sales, Service, Product Quality and Manufacturing i.e., Supply chain, Inventory, logistics etc.,  ? Ability and rigor to problem solving and develop solutions iteratively and methodically.  ? Collaborate with other engineers to lead, translate and build state-of-art scalable AI solutions for Enterprise Business Applications  ? Ability to lead and develop and innovate tools and technology by building software solutions using data science approaches for Vision / Face recognition, Speech / Natural Language Processing  ? Ability to provide advanced actionable insights, trends and KPIs and using statistical analysis and AI based data science methods  ? Provide thought leadership, conduct proof-of-concepts and research best practices to drive continuous innovation
